verses.verse: David <WH1732> therefore departed<WH3212> thence<WH4422>, and escaped to the cave<WH4631> of Adullam<WH5725>: and when his brethren<WH251> and all his father<WH1>'s house<WH1004> heard<WH8085> it<WH3381>, they went down thither to him.

And every one<WH376> that was in distress<WH4689>, and every one<WH376> that was in debt<WH5378>, and every one<WH376> that was discontented<WH4751>, gathered<WH6908> themselves unto him<WH8269>; and he became captain over them<WH702>: and there were with him about four hundred<WH3967> men<WH376>.

And David<WH1732> went<WH3212> thence to Mizpeh<WH4708> of Moab<WH4124>: and he said<WH559> unto the king<WH4428> of Moab<WH4124>, Let my father<WH1> and my mother<WH517>, I pray thee<WH3318>, come forth, and be with you<WH3045>, till I know what God<WH430> will do for me<WH6213>.
And he brought<WH5148> them before<WH6440> the king<WH4428> of Moab<WH4124>: and they dwelt<WH3427> with him all the while<WH3117> that David<WH1732> was in the stronghold<WH4686>.

And the prophet<WH5030> Gad<WH1410> said<WH559> unto David<WH1732>, Abide<WH3427> not in the stronghold<WH4686>; depart<WH3212>, and get<WH935> thee into the land<WH776> of Judah<WH3063>. Then David<WH1732> departed<WH3212>, and came<WH935> into the forest<WH3293> of Hereth<WH2802>.

And Saul<WH7586> heard<WH8085> that David<WH1732> was discovered<WH3045>, and the men<WH582> that were with him<WH7586>: now Saul was sitting<WH3427> in Gibeah<WH1390>, under the tamarisk-tree<WH815> in Ramah<WH7414>, with his spear<WH2595> in his hand<WH3027>, and all his servants<WH5650> were standing about him<WH5324>.

And Saul<WH7586> said<WH559> unto his servants<WH5650> that stood<WH5324> about him<WH8085>, Hear now, ye Benjamites<WH1145>; will the son<WH1121> of Jesse<WH3448> give<WH5414> every one of you fields<WH7704> and vineyards<WH3754>, will he make<WH7760> you all captains<WH8269> of thousands<WH505> and captains<WH8269> of hundreds<WH3967>,

that all of you have conspired<WH7194> against me<WH1540>, and there is none that discloseth to me when my son<WH1121> maketh a league<WH3772> with the son<WH1121> of Jesse<WH3448>, and there is none of you that is sorry<WH2470> for me<WH1540>, or discloseth unto me that my son<WH1121> hath stirred up<WH6965> my servant<WH5650> against me<WH693>, to lie in wait, as at this day<WH3117>?

Then answered<WH6030> Doeg<WH1673> the Edomite<WH130>, who stood<WH5324> by the servants<WH5650> of Saul<WH7586>, and said<WH559>, I saw<WH7200> the son<WH1121> of Jesse<WH3448> coming<WH935> to Nob<WH5011>, to Ahimelech<WH288> the son<WH1121> of Ahitub<WH285>.
And he inquired<WH7592> of Jehovah<WH3068> for him<WH5414>, and gave him victuals<WH6720>, and gave<WH5414> him the sword<WH2719> of Goliath<WH1555> the Philistine<WH6430>.

Then the king<WH4428> sent<WH7971> to call<WH7121> Ahimelech<WH288> the priest<WH3548>, the son<WH1121> of Ahitub<WH285>, and all his father<WH1>'s house<WH1004>, the priests<WH3548> that were in Nob<WH5011>: and they came<WH935> all of them to the king<WH4428>.
And Saul<WH7586> said<WH559>, Hear<WH8085> now<WH1121>, thou son of Ahitub<WH285>. And he answered<WH559>, Here I am<WH113>, my lord.

And Saul<WH7586> said<WH559> unto him<WH7194>, Why have ye conspired against me<WH1121>, thou and the son of Jesse<WH3448>, in that thou hast given<WH5414> him bread<WH3899>, and a sword<WH2719>, and hast inquired<WH7592> of God<WH430> for him<WH6965>, that he should rise against me<WH693>, to lie in wait, as at this day<WH3117>?

Then Ahimelech<WH288> answered<WH6030> the king<WH4428>, and said<WH559>, And who among all thy servants<WH5650> is so faithful<WH539> as David<WH1732>, who is the king<WH4428>'s son-in<WH2860>-law, and is taken<WH5493> into thy council<WH4928>, and is honorable<WH3513> in thy house<WH1004>?

Have I to-day<WH3117> begun<WH2490> to inquire<WH7592> of God<WH430> for him<WH2486>? be it far from me: let not the king<WH4428> impute<WH7760> anything<WH1697> unto his servant<WH5650>, nor to all the house<WH1004> of my father<WH1>; for thy servant<WH5650> knoweth<WH3045> nothing<WH1697> of all this<WH6996>, less or more<WH1419>.
And the king<WH4428> said<WH559>, Thou shalt surely<WH4191> die<WH4191>, Ahimelech<WH288>, thou<WH1>, and all thy father's house<WH1004>.

And the king<WH4428> said<WH559> unto the guard<WH7323> that stood<WH5324> about him<WH5437>, Turn, and slay<WH4191> the priests<WH3548> of Jehovah<WH3068>; because their hand<WH3027> also is with David<WH1732>, and because they knew<WH3045> that he fled<WH1272>, and did not disclose<WH1540> it to me<WH5650>. But the servants of the king<WH4428> would<WH14> not put forth<WH7971> their hand<WH3027> to fall<WH6293> upon the priests<WH3548> of Jehovah<WH3068>.

And the king<WH4428> said<WH559> to Doeg<WH1673>, Turn<WH5437> thou<WH6293>, and fall upon the priests<WH3548>. And Doeg<WH1673> the Edomite<WH130> turned<WH5437>, and he fell<WH6293> upon the priests<WH3548>, and he slew<WH4191> on that day<WH3117> fourscore<WH8084> and five<WH2568> persons<WH376> that did wear<WH5375> a linen<WH906> ephod<WH646>.

And Nob<WH5011>, the city<WH5892> of the priests<WH3548>, smote<WH5221> he with the edge<WH6310> of the sword<WH2719>, both men<WH376> and women<WH802>, children<WH5768> and sucklings<WH3243>, and oxen<WH7794> and asses<WH2543> and sheep<WH7716>, with the edge<WH6310> of the sword<WH2719>.
And one<WH259> of the sons<WH1121> of Ahimelech<WH288>, the son<WH1121> of Ahitub<WH285>, named<WH8034> Abiathar<WH54>, escaped<WH4422>, and fled<WH1272> after<WH310> David<WH1732>.
And Abiathar<WH54> told<WH5046> David<WH1732> that Saul<WH7586> had slain<WH2026> Jehovah<WH3068>'s priests<WH3548>.

And David<WH1732> said<WH559> unto Abiathar<WH54>, I knew<WH3045> on that day<WH3117>, when Doeg<WH1673> the Edomite<WH130> was there<WH5046>, that he would surely tell<WH5046> Saul<WH7586>: I have occasioned<WH5437> the death of all the persons<WH5315> of thy father<WH1>'s house<WH1004>.
Abide <WH3427> thou with me<WH3372>, fear not<WH1245>; for he that seeketh my life<WH5315> seeketh<WH1245> thy life<WH5315>: for with me thou shalt be in safeguard<WH4931>.
